snippet: Struggling with continuing deficits and a change in leadership in recent years, the Corcoran Gallery of Art may be looking to leave its imposing Beaux-Arts building at 17th Street and New York Avenue NW in Washington, according to the Washington City...
abstract: Struggling with continuing deficits and a change in leadership in recent years, the Corcoran Gallery of Art may be looking to leave its imposing Beaux-Arts building at 17th Street and New York Avenue NW in Washington, according to the Washington City Paper.

headline.main: Corcoran Gallery May Relocate After 115 Years
